Package controller

Interface IGUIController

All Superinterfaces:
IAppController
All Known Implementing Classes:
GUIController
public interface IGUIController extends IAppController
Represents a controller interface for handling GUI-based calendar operations.

      Creates a recurring event with the specified properties.
      Parameters:
      subject - event subject
      start - start time
      end - end time
      description - event description
      location - event location
      isPublic - visibility flag
      recurrenceDays - days of recurrence
      occurrenceCount - number of occurrences
      recurrenceEndDate - recurrence end date
      autoDecline - auto-decline flag

      result message

      from - start time of the event (used for specific modes)
